attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When a white person calls a coloured person something or does something to them they get arrested and charged but if it happens the other way round what happens? Nothing!
This is England for the English that doesn't mean that people of other races cannot come and live here but we are being taken over!
